about_the_game:
Burgie's cozy kitchen

Enjoy this cosy management wholesome game where you run your own comfy burger joint restaurant with a lovely and relaxed gameplay system:

  • Relaxing and cozy game. Play solo or with your community.

  • Simple and fun mechanics with its freedom of physics.

  • Play actively or minimize it while new kawaii customers come in.

Twitch chat integration

Connect it to your Twitch chat to accept orders from your own viewers. You can chat with them, serve them the food they want... And they will influence the review of your burger, helping (or not) you to climb the global ranking.

Use it while you work or do other things.

This game can be minimized to a corner of the screen, so you can focus on other tasks while waiting for cute clients come with new orders.

When a new order arrives, a bell will ring to notify you to prepare the order and earn more star ratings.

You can adjust the time between orders while the game is minimized.

  • Normal Mode: Play with customers who will enter consecutively.

  • Pomodoro Mode: Minimize the game, set the time, and a new client will arrive when your study or work session is over. The customer will ring a bell to notify you. An ideal gamified focus tool.

  • Streamer Mode: Minimize the game while you continue streaming other content. Every several minutes, a new adorable viewer can join through a simple Twitch chat command and ask you for the wildest order they can think of. Stay alert to avoid delivering the order late!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 64-bit: 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.4 GHz (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum specs may result in some unexpected game behavior and potential lag at certain points

short_description: A relaxing, cozy kitchen game. Manage your burger restaurant: minimize the game to the corner of your screen and wait for new customers, who will notice you when they arrive. Perfect as a gamified Pomodoro focus tool, or to integrate with your Twitch chat and play with your viewers.
